name: Sut
description:
Have you ever wanted to be an adorable, sticky ball of soot climbing its way out of a fireplace? Well now you can.

Sut is a cute, minimalist, pixel art 2D platformer with a satisfying wall-sticking mechanic. It rides the line between cozy and difficult. Sure, there's enemies to fight, lava to fall into, and spikes to jump over. Yes, you'll encounter challenges, you may even die. You may die a lot. But you're a cute little ball of soot, and you have all the time in the world to find your way out.

Features include:
  • Beat more than 49 levels! (50 levels. It has 50 levels.)
  • Stick to walls, leap over spikes, and blow enemies into harm's way
  • Skip any level if you get stuck
  • Track your progress through the level menu

  • Learn from your recent mistakes thanks to semi-persistent corpses
  • Listen to a custom, original soundtrack with ten songs done in a retro/chip-tune style
  • See how quickly you can beat each level using the built in timer
  • Enjoy lovingly crafted pixel art and animations
  • Save poor little Sut from a lifetime of suffering inside of a burning hot fireplace
  • You wouldn't just let Sut suffer, would you?
